item.description:
Get "Teddy Ready" For Christmas 2012!

I have received this years Teddy Bears from the Salvation Army .

Here is your opportunity to participate in an exciting program. Be Creative and Dress a Teddy Bear.

To be shared  with a needy child at Christmas!

Also a Teddy Bear on Parade at Sunrise  Assisted Living in Arlington. There will be judging for Best Dressed, Most Original & Totally Handmade.

I will have some supplies like felt and sewing needles . Can bring your own New or Like New Teddy and supples.

Please contact me with any questions.
item.how_to_find_us: At the table in Abeille's dressing my teddy.

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Get Teddy Ready -Xmas 2012 - Take 1
